Reddit is the place where people come together to have the most authentic and interesting conversations on the internet—Where gaming communities, nostalgic internet forums, bloggers, meme-makers, and fandoms mingle alongside video streamers, support groups, news junkies, armchair experts, seasoned professionals, and artists and creators of all types. 

With over 100,000 communities about every topic you could think of (and a few you’d probably never think of if it wasn’t for the creativity of strangers on the internet), Reddit is the place where you can dive into anything and connect with people on any topic. 

A few things you’ll find on Reddit… 

■ Thousands of communities
Whether you're into breaking news, sports, TV fan theories, or a never-ending stream of the internet's cutest animals, there's a community on Reddit for you.
■ Laughs, lols, and plenty of ridiculousness 
Lose track of vast amounts of time as you find memes, bananas for scale, bread stapled to trees, cat videos, and more of the absurd and oddly absorbing. 
■ The best discussions 
The real action is always in the comments. Reddit’s discussion threads are where community members jump in to provide commentary, humor, and insight. 
■ Answers to questions you’re too afraid to ask in public 
Recipes, street fashion, career help, fitness plans, and more—find ideas and inspiration for whatever you want to do.
■ Live video streams, chats, and talks
Want to know what people are doing right now? Streaming videos, live chats, and live audio conversations give you a variety of ways to connect with people in the moment. 
■ Crowd-sourced points of view on just about everything
Product reviewers, music critics, sports fans, or doge enthusiasts—find people that obsess and care about whatever it is you’re interested in.
■ Anonymous profiles so you can do you
On Reddit, you (not your job, number of friends, or social status) define who you are. 
■ Lots and lots of cats

Personalise your news offering with My News
Add topics wherever you see the + icon for a quick route straight to the stories you care about.
Stories from topics you add will appear in your personalised My News feed. Here you can order stories by topic or time to stay on top of the news of the day. Topics can be added, removed or re-ordered using the Edit function.

Find content fast
The app can suggest topics based on stories you’ve recently viewed and what’s in the news now.
And you can quickly find topics that interest you using the Search tab. Choose from the familiar list of BBC News indexes such as Business, Technology, Entertainment and Health, or search for your own subjects of interest, whether they’re people, places, things or themes.

More of the news you care about
We offer a full selection of stories from the newsroom, and many ways to read the best journalism from BBC correspondents, including:
- Popular - keep on top of the most read stories and most watched videos from across the BBC
- Video - One-minute World News summary and the latest video stories
- Live - BBC World Service Radio. Expertise and insight from our journalists available 24-hours a day and ready to listen to in the background as you browse

Other features:
- Push notifications for important news stories
- Video over cellular and wifi
- Improved offline experience. Download the latest stories when you have a signal and then read them at your leisure

Al jou nuus - gratis en in Afrikaans! Maroela Media hou jou op hoogte van die jongste nuusgebeure en ons maak seker dat jy weet watter boeke om te lees, hoe om vanaand se kos gaar te maak en wie die rugby gaan wen. In ons Vermaak en Leefstyl-afdeling kan jy selfs uitsien na daai stories wat jou na jou asem gaan laat snak, jou tot trane gaan dryf of jou laat skaterlag van lekkerkry en plesier. Ons meningvormers gesels kopstukke in Die Groot Debat en ons gee vir jou agtergrond oor gebeure in Nuuskommentaar. 

Ons is die nuusleser met die vreemde pruik, die soustannie met die lekker bak beskuit, die skeidsregter en die oom op die pawiljoen wat nartjies gooi. Ons is jou taaljuffrou en die pêl wat saam stokkies draai. Ons is jou ouma se sagte skouer en jou oom se blinknuwe motor. Skink vir jou 'n koppie boeretroos dan kuier jy lekker saam.

Kom kyk na die app en indien jy op enige kinkel in die kabel afkom, laat weet ons asseblief onmiddellik! Sonder jou bly ons app en ons hart gebroke.

Jy kan ook gratis registreer om jou weerligging in te stel, verskeie landbounuusbriewe ontvang, jou gunsteling-artikels bêre om later te lees, en vrae instuur vir dr. Faffa Malan en sy span kundiges.



Word ’n intekenaar op die Landbou.com-app en kry toegang tot die jongste Landbouweekblad (nog voor dit die rak tref) én ’n argief van vyf jaar se uitgawes, sowel as elke uitgawe van ons spesiale tydskrifte Boerekos, Boereplanne, Vee, Tegnologie en Herlewing. Ons landboujoernaliste en medewerkers, wat wetenskaplikes, ekonome en markspesialiste insluit, skryf oor onderwerpe wat wissel van tegnologie en herlewingslandbou tot landbou-ekonomie en politieke vraagstukke. 



Lees ook boeke soos dr. Faffa Malan se Vra die Veearts-reeks, Gids tot volhoubare produksie van weiding, en Theo Vorster se Familieboerderye in Suid-Afrika. As intekenaar kan jy ook na die nuutste episodes van Landbouweekliks kyk. 



Landbouweekblad bied gereeld webinare aan vir ’n verskeidenheid van bedrywe, waar kenners inligting verskaf oor volhoubare boerderymetodes. Landbou.com is the digital home of Landbouweekblad, which has been part of the lives of South African farmers for more than 100 years. With the Landbou.com app you can stay up to date with the latest agricultural news, weather information that matters and current market prices – absolutely free!



You can also register for free to set up your weather information, receive various agricultural newsletters, save your favourite articles to read later and submit questions to dr Faffa Malan and his team of experts.



Become a subscriber to the Landbou.com app and get access to the latest Landbouweekblad (even before it hits the shelves) and an archive of five years' issues, as well as every issue of our special magazines: Boerekos, Boereplanne, Vee, Tegnologie and Herlewing. Our team of journalists and collaborators, which includes scientists, economists and market specialists, cover topics like technology, regenerative agriculture, agricultural economics and political matters. 



Read books like dr. Faffa Malan's Vra die Veearts series, Gids tot volhoubare produksie van weiding and Theo Vorster's Familieboerderye in Suid-Afrika. As a subscriber you can also watch the latest episodes of Landbouweekliks.



Landbouweekblad hosts webinars for a variety of industries, where experts provide information on sustainable farming methods. As a subscriber you get access to some of these webinars, as well as discounts to attend these webinars yourself. A weekly news bulletin also highlights the most important agricultural information. Do not miss the food videos of our award-winning food editor, Arina du Plessis.



As a subscriber, you can also:
• Read and post comments on articles;
• Listen to articles –  areno matter where you;
• Share three articles per month with your friends;
• Receive an exclusive newsletter for subscribers.

Balanced News Summary is an unbiased news source self-funded and created by an independent Australian researcher. We offer multiple perspectives on the political spectrum for each particular topic so that you can read both sides and form your own opinion! We also offer short, unbiased news summaries to get you up to date with the news quickly and conveniently. Unbiased news summaries ensure you get the facts without the spin.

App Features:
• No subscription fees, no intrusive ads, convenient and easy to use!
• Get the complete picture by contrasting left (red), centre (purple), and right-leaning (blue) headlines to each other. If you want to avoid being misled by one-sided media, this is the most time-effective way.
• Over 1,000 Australian and global news sources rated as left/centre-left/centre/centre-right/right bias.
• Short, convenient unbiased news summaries on a wide range of topics – get the facts within 30 seconds!
• Get today’s headlines across a wide range of topics, segmented by countries and categories. We provide live 24/7 updates in one convenient app on the following categories: Breaking News, Australia & New Zealand news, U.S. news, U.K. news, India news, Canada news, Europe news, Asia news, Latin America news, Middle East news, Africa news, World news, Business news, Politics news, Sport news, Entertainment & Arts news, Health news, Tech news, Environment news, Crime news, Activism news.
• Access news from a variety of sources. The best news coverage from left, centre and right publications can be found right here – news aggregated from thousands of popular sources across the globe, such as ABC News, Sky News, SBS, NDTV, BBC, 9News, MSNBC, New York Times, News.com.au, The Guardian, The Wall Street Journal, Bloomberg, Fox News, CNN and many more!
• Factual News Search – use the customised Google search in this app to conduct research that only searches for highly factual news sources.
• Summaries of thousands of articles!

Recent trends show that trust in news is declining. A Roy Morgan survey in 2018 discovered that the second most mentioned reason for adult Australians avoiding the news was ‘I feel that news content is biased towards a particular ideology’. In a 2020 study by the University of Canberra, only 38% of respondents said they could trust Australian news. More recently, Dr Jennifer Oriel from The Australian reported that 67% of respondents in the Edelman Trust Barometer survey believe journalists “are purposely trying to mislead people by saying things they know are false or gross exaggerations”.

As a result, individuals are becoming less tolerant of opposing views, and communities are being divided based on political preference. Balanced News Summary hopes to break this trend by identifying bias and offering balanced analysis from both sides of the political spectrum.

The purpose of this app is to provide clarity and reunite communities. Balanced News Summary is intended for education and research and does not claim ownership of external websites shown. Every effort has been made to offer equal opinions from the left, centre, and the right.

Questions or feedback on the Balanced News Summary app? Contact us at BalancedNewsAus@gmail.com

Privacy policy: https://balancednewssummary.com/privacy-policy/

Instapaper is the simplest way to save and store articles for reading: offline, on-the-go, anytime, anywhere, perfectly formatted. 

Instapaper for iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch provides a mobile-optimized text view that makes reading Internet content a clean and uncluttered experience. Instapaper also enhances the standard reading experience with features like text-to-speech.

Instapaper has been inducted into the iPhone and iPad Hall of Fame, received Macworld Editor's Choice Award, and has also been featured in publications including Wired, TIME, Daring Fireball, and The Verge, among others.

Core Features:
- Strip away all clutter and save the content of web pages into iOS-optimized formatting.
- Read anywhere! No internet, no problem: access your articles on airplanes, subways, elevators, or Wi-Fi-only devices away from Internet connections.

Additional Features:
- Control every aspect of your reading experience with a variety of font, color themes, and spacing options.
